title: Silent Melody: A Pied Piper Retelling
description: When the Pied Piper came, only three children remained. One was deaf and one was blind.Being deaf meant life was hard for Adelaide in thirteenth century Germany. However, it also saved her from the Pied Piper's music. When the children were stolen, she was left behind.Now she and her blind friend must risk everything to free the children trapped in an eternal dance. But to rescue them she must face the Heartless Queen, who will do anything to keep them, and survive her twisted games.Adelaide finds she has no choice but to trust the man she should hate and hope he is not playing games of his own.If she fails, the children will be lost forever.
author: Alice Ivinya
